title: What is the interpretation of wine in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi?

preview.html: Wine in a dream: There is no doubt that wine is one of the Islamic prohibitions, and drinking alcohol is one of the practices forbidden by religion because of its negative effects on the mind and conscience. Or he drinks and the fortuneteller also finds wine, so what is the significance of that? Wine In some cases, it indicates recovery from diseases and ailments, and a large amount of alcohol indicates disagreement, hostility, and the spread of temptations and suspicions, and pouring wine indicates repentance, guidance, and reason. Drinking alcohol is evidence of isolation, loss, and decadence, and it has been said: Drinking alcohol is evidence of safety, for the drunkard has no fear. One day, and drinking wine until drunkenness is evidence of the prohibition of profit and money. Whoever drinks wine and does not drink, then sits with his lover and praises his qualities, and whoever drinks wine without drinking alcohol, this indicates the excessive worries and troubles of life. Wine in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that wine indicates ignorance. And temptation without knowledge, and affects what is going on around it in confusion and ambiguity, and whoever sees alcohol, this is forbidden money that its owner must purify it of doubt and prohibition. Drunkenness is evidence of ignorance, wandering, and futility of work, and whoever sees that he is drinking alcohol, it is money that a person earns easily, and he may reap profits Many, but suspicious profits, and alcohol expresses temptations, desires, and worldly pleasures. Whoever is seen drinking alcohol greedily, this indicates lack of sense, loss of prestige, loss of prestige, and loss of money. As for whoever sees himself pouring alcohol, this indicates his return to reason and righteousness, and abandoning sin. And jihad against himself. Drinking alcohol in a dream Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi says that alcohol indicates intense hostility, cold enmity, and the outbreak of strife and discord among people, and drinking alcohol symbolizes money in which there is suspicion or isolation from authority and status, and whoever is drunk is in strife. Religion and worldly life. Whoever sees that he is drinking alcohol, this indicates that he is informed of the secrets of others and reveals them, and a person can fall into great sins such as adultery, and alcohol, in terms of pronunciation, is interpreted as what it brews in the soul. From desires and whims, and what the mind creates of evil beliefs and thoughts. Alcohol mixed with water is interpreted as mixing truth and falsehood, forbidden and forbidden, and whoever drinks alcohol and is alone, he must look at his money and gains, and he will be deprived. And whoever drinks alcohol or shares his cup with Otherwise, this symbolizes intense hostility and prolonged strife. As for drinking alcohol for the dead person, it is evidence of his happiness with what is in it, a good ending, and a high status. What is the interpretation of seeing alcohol in a single woman’s dream? Seeing alcohol symbolizes whims and desires that corrupt the heart and desires that are difficult to achieve because of doubt about them. And the urgent need of the soul to do evil. Whoever sees that she is drinking alcohol even when she is drunk, she surrenders to

title: Interpretation of a dream about putting a pen in a dream

There are a large number of connotations and interpretations of dreams. Interpretation of a dream of giving a pen in a dream. Giving a pencil in a dream may indicate knowledge and insight gains by those around him. A dream of giving a pencil may indicate A pen in a dream indicates taking responsibility and performing one’s duties. If you see a gift of pain in a dream, it may indicate a request for friendship or marriage from that person, and God knows best. Dreaming of a gift of a pen in a dream may indicate good and ample livelihood that the person with the vision may obtain. In his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving someone candy in a dream Giving candy in a dream may indicate the love that exists between you and God knows best. A person’s dream that he received candy from another person in a dream may indicate his closeness to him in those days, thanks to God. In the event that there is a vision of giving someone sweets in a dream, it can indicate the abundance of goodness and ample life that the dreamer can obtain during this time, and God knows best. In the event that one sees that he received sweets as a gift from another person in a dream, it may be a sign On the happiness and goodness that may happen to the dreamer in the coming days, and God knows best. In the event that you see the gift of a prayer cloth in a dream, this may indicate positive changes That happens to the visionary in his life during those days. It is possible that seeing prayer clothes as a gift in a dream indicates happy events that will come to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. The vision of offering prayer clothes in a dream may be positive developments that occur to the visionary in his life during this time. Time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving soap in a dream: Giving a gift of soap in a dream may indicate the goodness and piety that the dreamer has in his life at that time. It is possible that seeing someone giving a gift of soap in a dream indicates a new life that may occur. For the vision in the coming days, thanks to God. In the event that a person sees that he received a gift of soap in a dream, this may be an indication of the abundance of money and a great living that the person with the vision can obtain during this period, thanks to God. In the event that someone sees that he received Soap as a gift in a dream, this may mean that you are taking advice from other people and that God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a gift of dishes in a dream. Giving away dishes in a dream while they are empty may indicate some problems and obstacles that the dreamer faces in his life and must be prevented. The dream may indicate Someone giving a white dish in a dream indicates the joy and happiness that comes from the dreamer, thanks to God. In the event that he is seen giving utensils and dishes in a dream, this may indicate the vast livelihood that the dreamer may gain in his life at that time. Whoever sees in his dream that he has gained According to a gift in a dream, it may indicate the affection and respect that he enjoys

title: Seeing oranges in a dream for a man

preview.html: Here, the interpretation of the dream varies according to the dreamer’s condition and his view of the color orange, as its colors change. There are many clues and interpretations that we learn on our website today from gptafser.com/, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing oranges in a dream for one girl: Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream that someone gives her oranges and oranges appear in the form of Beautiful and pleasing to the eye. The vision here is considered a source of goodness for Major Haitham because it symbolizes the marriage of an unmarried girl to a man of religion, morals, justice and piety from God. Seeing a single girl dreams of orange fruits. The vision indicates the presence of a large, abundant and good diet, especially if the girl’s eyesight is in Winter is the season for the availability of oranges. A single girl seeing in a dream that she is buying orange fruit. The vision interprets that in real life she will buy something precious and of value. Or perhaps the vision is a sign that he will live a happy life full of comfort, stability and reassurance. In the event that an unmarried girl dreams In a dream, she peels an orange but does not eat it. The vision symbolizes that this girl carries within her feelings of love and affection towards someone, and she will learn this feeling towards him soon. But if a girl sees in her dream that she is eating oranges and enjoying its delicious taste. The dream means good skin for her, It indicates that this girl will get rid of the worries and problems that she faces in her life. This is a reason for her psychological condition to worsen, but with God’s will, her psychological state will improve and her psychological state will improve soon. A married woman dreams of bringing Her husband has a lot of oranges and they both eat oranges. The vision shows the extent of understanding, stability and love between the spouses. If a married woman sees an orange tree in her dream, her vision means that the dreamer is an honest person. And that she is always ready in her real life to perform her duties with her family and husband. But if A married woman saw an orange fruit in her dream and its color was green. The vision is considered good news for the dreamer that he will become pregnant soon after a long period of waiting. For a married woman to see in her dream that she is buying oranges and that the oranges are healthy and fresh is attractive. The vision symbolizes that the dreamer will get a lot of money. In the coming period. But if the woman bought oranges in a dream and the oranges were rotten. Here the vision is considered a source of doubt because it indicates that the married woman will make a wrong decision in her life that she will regret in the future. But if the married woman saw that she was distributing rotten oranges in a dream to Those around her. The vision shows how bad her will is and her lack of love for the people around her. She is a personality that carries a lot of negative feelings for those around her. Seeing oranges in general in a married woman’s dream indicates the arrival of good and abundant sustenance that prevails over her and her family. title: Interpretation of a dream about a luxury car by senior scholars

preview.html: Interpretations of dreams about luxury cars are considered happy visions for their owner. Every one of us wishes to have a car that provides him with all the comforts and luxury and allows him to move from one place to another in an easy and quick way. Seeing this car in a dream is considered a good omen and a sign worthy of praise for its owner that leads to the arrival of some happy occasions and happy occasions, and this varies according to the social status of the viewer. Interpretations of dreams of luxury carsSeeing a luxury car in a dream shows the extent of the viewer’s self-confidence and is a sign of his desire to achieve any goals and objectives. He wants it no matter how difficult it is. Whoever sees himself owning a luxury car indicates that the viewer feels that he is the best among those around him and that no one can compete with him. The dreamer who sees in her dream an ordinary car overturning and becoming luxurious is a vision that symbolizes the emergence of some positive developments in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a car in a dream means the arrival of a lot of money and a sign that you live in a better and higher social level than the current one, and dreaming of a luxury car in a dream symbolizes the arrival of joy and happiness in one’s fortune teller during the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about a luxury car by Ibn Sirin Cars are among the modern inventions that have not been They did not exist in the time of Ibn Sirin, but some translators worked hard and gave different interpretations of this dream according to what Ibn Sirin mentioned about the means of transportation that existed in his time. Dreaming of luxury cars in a dream symbolizes the emergence of many transformations in the life of the fortuneteller, and this will make his life better. Seeing a luxury car in a dream leads to increased profits in trade and is a sign of successful deals. Dreaming of a car in a dream symbolizes salvation from any problems and crises that the dreamer is currently facing. The dreamer who sees a luxury car in his dream is an indication of that person’s ability to overcome any obstacles. He faces it in his life. way and prevents him from achieving his goals. Interpretation of a dream about a luxury car for a single woman: Dreaming of a virgin girl in a luxury car indicates the offer of a good person in her marriage, and often a wealthy person with a prominent position in society. A dream for a girl who has never been married before with an expensive car in a dream is A dream leads this girl to earn a lot of money in the coming period. A luxury car in anyone’s dream symbolizes this girl’s transition to a higher social and living standard and is a praiseworthy sign that leads to achieving goals and fulfilling desires in the near future. A girl who sees a luxury car in front of her door is a dream. It symbolizes that this girl will get a good job opportunity and a prestigious position in her work. Dreaming about an expensive car in a girl’s dream indicates that this girl’s life will develop for the better in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about a luxury car for a married woman: A wife who sees in her dream a luxury car is a sign that she She lives in marital happiness and it is a sign that her life is developing for the better. Seeing a married woman in an expensive car in a dream means that she lives with her husband in stability and peace of mind and is a sign of salvation from any

title: Interpretation of a red face in a dream: Seeing a red face in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a red face for an unmarried girl, about a married woman, about a pregnant woman, about a divorced woman, or seeing red cheeks, Ibn Sirin's face distorted, ugly, beautiful, white, black, burnt, and more. Interpretation of a red face in a dream Seeing a face in general in a dream often expresses the state of the dreamer who lives in real life. If the face in the dream is nice and beautiful, this is an indication of the dreamer's good state in reality and that he finds happiness and lives with pleasure. If the face bears signs and expressions that are not good in the dream, the dream indicates the bad conditions in which the dreamer lives and the succession of worries and sorrows on him in real life. The skin of the face in the dream refers to the cover with which the person is honored in his life. The color of this facial skin expresses the state of the dreamer in his hidden behavior. If the skin color is beautiful, the dream indicates the good deeds that the dreamer hides from people. If the skin color is ugly, the dream indicates the bad deeds and behaviors that the dreamer hides from people. As for seeing a red face in a dream, it is a vision that brings the dreamer good news and good news for days full of Happiness. Whoever sees in his dream that his face is red, it was not in reality, his vision shows the high status that this person acquires in reality. Redness in the dream indicates the joys and happiness that the dreamer finds in wakefulness. If the dreamer is unmarried, male or female, it is said that the meaning of this situation that he sees is that he will soon enter the marital home, God willing, and fill his home with joy. And it came in another place on the tongue of Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, that seeing the redness of the face or the redness of the face in which some whiteness appears indicates the dream of glory, honor and high status that the dreamer acquires in reality. In general, all the indications and meanings mentioned in the interpretation of seeing the red face or the redness of the face in a dream carry with it the good, food, joy and happiness that the dreamer finds in reality and that it is honor, glory and respect that the dreamer meets in reality or that he reaches a high rank and high status while awake. Among the cases mentioned by Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, in seeing the redness of the face or its redness in a dream: There is no indication of the bad or evil that a person tries to avoid in his life. Interpretation of redness of the face in a dream If a girl dreams that Her face is red with shame, which means that she will suffer from tension and shame due to false accusations. Interpretation of seeing the face - YouTube Interpretation of the face in a dream, Professor Iyad Al-Adwan - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about drinking tea with my husband in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: Drinking tea with my husband in a dream. If you want to know the interpretation of a dream about drinking tea with my husband in a dream, it is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to know an explanation for that. We will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some hardworking scholars and directors. The site does not interfere in interpretations, but rather conveys the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about drinking tea with my husband in a dream: Seeing tea with one’s husband in a dream may indicate some differences that exist between them. Dreaming of one’s husband drinking tea with another man may indicate some stress and tension in which the husband lives during At this time, it is possible for a woman to see in a dream drinking tea with her husband, which indicates that her dreams and wishes will come true in those days, and God knows best. If a woman sees that she is drinking tea with her husband in a dream, this may indicate some changes that will occur in his life during this period, and God knows best. I know. Interpretation of a dream about a husband eating burnt food in a dream. If you see your husband eating burnt food, this may indicate that he has been betrayed or cheated by someone. In the event that you see your husband eating burnt food, this may indicate his inability to achieve his goals and aspirations, thanks to God. Seeing one’s wife eating burnt food in a dream may indicate some financial problems that he may face in his life during this period. Dreaming of eating burnt food at a wedding in a dream may indicate some problems and crises that existed between them at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation Dreaming of a husband drinking from his wife in a dream. This dream may indicate the difficulties and problems that her husband faced in his life during those days. title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person alive in a dream, sick

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person alive in a dream? It is a question asked by many people who have seen this dream before. Seeing the dead in a dream is one of the most common dreams, especially for deceased relatives or any person. What he desires most after his death is to see them again because of his longing for them, and in the world of dreams this dream carries many symbols and associations that express important events in the life of the viewer or It reflects his psychological state or it may be about something important to the deceased, and dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi have worked hard to reveal the meaning of this dream, which you will find in an encyclopedia.Interpretation of seeing a dead person alive in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a dead person alive in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin continued the interpretation of seeing a dead person alive in The dream is that if the dreamer sees the dead person talking to him in a dream, then this vision indicates his good standing in the afterlife, and God knows best. But if the fortuneteller hears the voice of a dead person ordering him to follow him and does not carry out this order, then this vision is not good and warns him of major problems. If the dead person speaks for a long time with the monarch This vision indicates the long life of God. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that if the dreamer sees himself eating food from the dead and talking to him, then this vision foretells that he will obtain a lot of money. As for the resurrection of the dead in a dream, this vision indicates that the dreamer will become modern. Guidance for many people in reality. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing a dead person alive in a dream. Al-Nabulsi narrated that seeing a dead person alive in a dream indicates a good ending, but in the case of crying loudly, this vision symbolizes the need for the dead person to pray for him and give charity. If the dreamer sees the deceased in an imperfect appearance This vision shows the extent of his negligence in obeying God, and this vision is the dreamer’s message about the necessity of supplication and almsgiving for him. If the dreamer sees his deceased father crying in a dream, this vision shows how bad the dreamer’s psychological state is, and his father’s crying symbolizes the extent of his feeling of what he is going through in reality. Seeing the dreamer wearing green clothes in a dream indicates his status in Paradise, and God knows best. If the deceased was silent in the dream and did not want to talk to the fortuneteller, then this vision shows the extent of his anger over an act committed by the fortuneteller in reality. Among the interpretations that Al-Nabulsi mentioned regarding this dream If you see the dead talking in a dream, this vision indicates the cessation of worries and problems in reality, and this vision symbolizes the transition of the dead person to a better state in the afterlife. If you see the dead person in a dream scolding and scolding him, this vision shows that he has committed many sins, and this vision serves as a warning message to the dreamer. It is necessary to repent to God. Seeing a dead person in a dream is sick. If one sees a sick deceased in a dream, this vision carries many indications, including that it shows that he has committed sins and disobedience, and it may also indicate his desire to repay the debt. Seeing a deceased sick He suffers from severe pain in his stomach, indicating the extent of his sadness and pain as a result of not carrying out his will. In the event that he sees a dead patient in the hospital, this vision shows that he was not

title: Interpretation of a dream about a wife cheating on her husband by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a wife cheating on her husband, according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. We have many dreams and visions during her sleep that cause anxiety and tension among those who watch them, especially dreams that respond to a woman and are related to problems or disputes that she saw during her sleep, which prompts her to search for explanations for this dream and what it entails. Its consequences and ways to get rid of it, and the dreams that cause panic in women are dreams related to betrayal, and below we talk about the interpretation of the dream of a woman who cheats on her husband, according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of the dream of a woman cheating on her husband. In the interpretation of the dream of a wife cheating on her husband, there were many clues that clarify its meanings, This is due to the large number of searches for it and its spread among fortune-tellers. This dream can be interpreted as follows: The interpretation of a dream about a woman cheating on her husband can indicate her intense love and devotion to her husband. The meaning of the dream is that the wife sees her happiness in her husband’s happiness and in her wishes for good health. It can also indicate the man’s success in choosing his partner. The dream indicates That the wife needs her husband in the marital relationship. An indication that the viewer feels guilty for what he did. Interpretation of a dream about a wife cheating on her husband by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin is one of the prominent interpretation scholars in this field. When interpreting the dream of a wife who cheated on her husband, he came to a number of interpretations, which are represented in the following results: If the economic level of the spouses is moderate, this indicates mutual love and loyalty between them. But if its level is high, this indicates a warning and a warning of the problems that will cause The fortune teller loses his money. It can indicate loyalty between spouses. It shows their fear of losing each other. Interpretation of a dream about a wife cheating on her husband by Ibn Shaheen While the scholar and expert in it, Ibn Shaheen, came up with other interpretations of the dream of a woman who betrayed her husband, he came up with the following interpretations of the dream, which are as follows This dream indicates that the husband is obsessed with his wife. The dream shows the deception and machinations of Satan and his attempt to separate them using the husband’s subconscious mind. It likely indicates that the wife is loving and loyal to the husband. Likewise, it shows that the husband loves his wife very much and is afraid of losing her. It is possible, according to Ibn Shaheen. To show that the dreamer himself is afraid of the idea of ​​betrayal itself. Interpretation of a dream about a wife cheating on her husband in Nabulsi. It should be noted that Sheikh Al-Allamah Nabulsi, may God protect him, came up with an interpretation of the dream of a woman who cheated on her husband in a group of interpretations and indications presented in the following interpretations: A dream about a woman cheating on her husband indicates Her intense fear of betrayal between them. If the person’s financial level is high, this indicates that he will be exposed to a problem that will cause him to lose money and poverty. Perhaps the dream indicates the emergence of adultery, God forbid. It indicates that the fortuneteller will have a successful marriage. Interpretations of a dream about a woman cheating on her husband. Here is a group of interpretations Which was mentioned regarding the interpretation of a dream about a woman who cheated on her husband for a married woman in several cases in which the woman saw the dream, which are represented in the following cases: Interpretation of a dream about a wife cheating on her husband with an unmarried woman

This dream indicates that she is exposed to evil. Also, He is trying to harm her, and God knows best. But if she sees that one of her friends has performed magic on her in her sleep. This vision indicates that there is a friend of hers who wants to harm her, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is being pampered by a bewitched person in the dream. Therefore, this The vision is good news for her, and so is this vision. That is, this girl is walking on the straight path close to God Almighty. For an unmarried girl to see that she is treating an enchanted young man in her dream. This dream indicates that you will be exposed to a problem. But after that, you will get rid of this problem. And you will have a good husband who suits her. If a girl sees that there is magic buried in her, then this vision shows the mistakes she is committing. This girl should be careful and stay away from this path, and draw closer to God Almighty, and God knows best. Seeing magic buried in a dream may indicate one girl. In a negative feeling that is suppressed internally, or is subjected to strong psychological pressure, and God knows best. This indicates the presence of an enemy in her life who is causing her harm and harm. Seeing A married woman melts and treats the bewitched. This indicates that this woman is close to God and on the straight path. She is kind and loving, and she will obtain a great and great provision. When a married woman sees magic in a dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted this vision to mean that she was suffering from many problems with Her husband, and God knows best. Magic in a married woman’s vision is a sign of problems, disagreements and conflicts in her married life. Magic also indicates the presence of an enemy in a married woman’s life. Magic buried in a married woman’s dream is an indication that this woman is far from the right path. Do not devote herself for her worship and prayers and does not obey God’s commandments, so she must worship God as he deserves to be worshipped. If a married woman dreams that she has fallen in a dream. This vision shows that she has failed in her married life with her husband. But if she sees that she has been hit with spells and released them, then they are cast upon her. Spells. It means the end and removal of all problems and worries in her married life, and God knows best. A magic buried inside a married woman’s private house. An indication that this woman and her husband earn their livelihood through a forbidden means and their money is forbidden. Interpretation of seeing that I work in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a man sees in a dream that magic It has befallen him, and that he has caught that magic. This indicates that this man was committing great sins and transgressions, but he repented.

A dream about my wife’s sister may indicate that she wants to hit me in a dream. It could be a sign of the good relationship between them in those days, thank God. In the case of a dream about the husband’s sister, he wanted to hit me in the dream, this may indicate her desire for happiness and joy, and God knows best. This vision may be an indication of the end of a dispute between them. In the past days, and God knows best. This vision could also indicate the pressure and tension that the woman feels at that time, and God knows best. It is possible that this dream indicates new changes that may occur in the life of the person who had the dream, thanks to God.
